short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app designed to boost your productivity and bring relaxation to your day!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay organized and focused with tools designed to boost your productivity and relaxation. This extension provides everything you need to manage your day effectively:
- Access a wide range of radio stations.
- Enhance your experience with ambient sounds.
- Focus sessions to block distracting websites and keep you on track
- Create and organize notes effortlessly.
- Track your habits and build better routines.
- Set and manage goals effectively.
- Break down goals into actionable tasks.
- Generate QR codes for links, text, and more.
- Enjoy access to all additional features designed for productivity and relaxation.
